statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount < 500 AND block_number > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 5000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000
SELECT DISTINCT from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY from_address ASC, to_address DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, from_address, to_address, transaction_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT block_number, block_hash FROM block_details WHERE transactions_count > 5 ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xAbCdEf' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY sender_address
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND receiver_address = '0x456def'
SELECT block_number, block_hash, transactions_count FROM block_details WHERE validator_address = '0x789ghi' ORDER BY block_number DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp, total_transactions FROM block_details ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT address, total_received, balance FROM address_details WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, transaction_hash, transaction_timestamp, transaction_status FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND block_id < 500 ORDER BY block_id, transaction_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM block_details WHERE block_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY total_transactions DESC, block_timestamp ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_hash, b.block_hash, a.address, a.balance FROM blockchain_transactions t JOIN block_details b ON t.block_id = b.block_id JOIN address_details a ON t.sender_address = a.address WHERE t.amount >= 5000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC, a.balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, block_reward, total_transactions_count FROM blocks ORDER BY block_reward DESC;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT address_id, address, total_transactions_count FROM addresses WHERE total_transactions_count > 50 ORDER BY total_transactions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT transaction_hash, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, miner_address, total_transactions_count FROM blocks WHERE block_reward > 50.00 AND total_transactions_count >= 10 ORDER BY block_number;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT address, total_transactions_count FROM addresses WHERE total_transactions_count > 50 ORDER BY total_transactions_count DESC, address ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp, miner_address, transaction_count FROM block_information ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT address_id, address, total_transactions, total_amount_received FROM address_info WHERE total_transactions > 100;
SELECT miner_address, reward_amount, reward_date FROM mining_rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100 ORDER BY reward_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, miner_address FROM block_information ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT address, total_transactions FROM address_info WHERE total_transactions > 1000;
SELECT detail_id, detail_type, detail_description FROM transaction_details WHERE detail_type = 'refund' ORDER BY detail_id ASC;
